What are you thankful for this week?: Apa sampeyan matur nuwun kanggo minggu iki?
What are you struggling with and how can: Apa sing sampeyan berjuang karo lan kepiye bisa mbantu?
How did you put into practice the script: Kepiye sampeyan nglatih tulisan / crita sing diteliti wektu pungkasan kita ketemu?
Who did you share last week's lesson wit: Sapa sing nuduhake pelajaran minggu kepungkur lan kepiye?
What needs did you meet in the community: Apa sing dibutuhake ing komunitas minggu kepungkur?
Ask someone to read the passage one para: Takone wong maca paragraf siji sekaligus.
Have a group member tell it in their own: Duwe anggota klompok nyritakake tembunge dhewe.
Ask the group if they added anything or: Takon grup yen nambahi apa-apa utawa ora ana apa-apa.
When you finish with ALL paragraphs, ask: Yen wis rampung karo kabeh paragraf, takon karo wong liya ing kabeh klompok kasebut kanthi memori. Duwe grup mbenerake kesalahan.
What does this passage tell us about God: Apa sing dicritakake babagan Gusti Allah?
What does this passage tell us about peo: Apa sing dicritakake babagan wong liya?
If this passage is true, what behaviour: Yen wacana iki bener, apa prilaku sing kudu kita ganti minggu iki?
Who will you tell this story to this wee: Sapa sing bakal ngerti crita iki ing minggu iki?
What needs can we meet in the community: Apa sing kudu kita lakoni ing komunitas minggu iki?
Would you like to discover with your fri: Apa sampeyan pengin nemokake karo kanca-kanca apa sing dikepengini karo Gusti Allah lan kepiye Gusti Allah sampeyan manggon?
Here are some questions to get your disc: Mangkene sawetara pitakon kanggo entuk diskusi sampeyan.
Would you like to discover for yourself: Apa sampeyan pengin nemokake apa sing disenengi karo Gusti Allah lan kepiye Gusti Allah sampeyan manggon?
Most people like to make these discoveri: Umume wong seneng nemokake penemuan kasebut ing klompok karo kanca-kancane.
